scripts.build: npx tsx build-styrbord-tokens.ts && sed 's/--/--ds-/g' < dist/style-tokens.css > dist/style-ds.css && cat dist/style-tokens.css dist/style-ds.css static-tokens.css > dist/style.css && sed -i 's/-accent/-xxxxxx/g' dist/style.css && sed -i 's/-primary/-accent/g' dist/style.css  && sed -i 's/-xxxxxx/-primary/g' dist/style.css
